Text: 10 million per year shall be required to file annual income tax returns and declare this rental income together with income from other sources.
Cause: file annual income tax returns and declare this rental income together with income from other sources.
Effect: 10 million per year shall be required
Sentence: <e2>10 million per year shall be required</e2> to <e1>file annual income tax returns and declare this rental income together with income from other sources.</e1>
